name: Long Time No Life
description:
After a lifetime of research, the Resurrection Project BEARS FRUIT!  

You're ALIVE once again... with some caveats.

A Brief Romantic Sci-Fi Comedy Story 

The Game was made for the O2A2 2022 jam.  The goal of the jam is to develop a VN under these limitations:

  • One Sprite Character
  • One Background
  • One Soundtrack
  • One Sound Effect
  • A story with 1000 words or less
  • Done within a week

----

This was a FUN challenge, and I really enjoyed thinking small and quickly for this story.  I hope you enjoy this short love story as much as I enjoyed making it.
